memberdef.argsstring: (lv_coord_t x, lv_coord_t y, const lv_area_t *mask, lv_coord_t len, lv_color_t color, lv_opa_t opa)
memberdef.name: ver_line

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_coord_t x, lv_coord_t y, const lv_area_t *mask, lv_coord_t len, lv_color_t color, lv_opa_t opa)
memberdef.name: hor_line

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_coord_t center_x, lv_coord_t center_y, uint16_t radius, const lv_area_t *mask, uint16_t start_angle, uint16_t end_angle, const lv_style_t *style, lv_opa_t opa_scale)
memberdef.name: lv_draw_arc

detaileddescription.para:
Draw an arc. (Can draw pie too with great thickness.)
center_x
the x coordinate of the center of the arc
center_y
the y coordinate of the center of the arc
radius
the radius of the arc
mask
the arc will be drawn only in this mask
start_angle
the start angle of the arc (0 deg on the bottom, 90 deg on the right)
end_angle
the end angle of the arc
style
style of the arc (body.thickness, body.main_color, body.opa is used)
opa_scale
scale down all opacities by the factor
